title: Key Fragments Wont Drop For Me Anymore
body: I seem to not be getting anymore key fragments after matches and i really want to know whats happening with it. My brother keeps getting them but i never get them anymore. I didn't get one at all last month. Please Help Me Out

replies.body:
Have you been recently suspended or chat restricted? 

The drop rate for keys does decrease over time, but it's weighted so that after a certain number of wins without a key you'll get one for sure anyway. 

The only thing that completely disables Hextech Crafting rewards (temporarily) is a punishment. Read more about it [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209939463) if you think this might apply to you.
I was never suspended or chat banned. i have so many chests and two key fragments and i havent got anymore since

I was punished before the key fragments were even a thing, its just a fact of not getting them...

I have played 20-50 odd games without a single key drop, a few chest drops, but that's limited, the only thing that changed for me, was i got two gemstones out of a chest then i never got a key fragment again
Same lol, i have 5 chests no fragments
